cgv.title: Terms and Conditions of Sale (T&C) – Travliaq
cgv.section1.title: 1. Purpose
cgv.section1.p1: These Terms and Conditions of Sale (hereinafter "T&C") define the terms of use of the services offered by Travliaq, an online platform for AI-powered optimized travel planning assistance.
cgv.section1.li2: Access to recommendations for flights, accommodations, activities, weather, and local experiences,
cgv.section1.li3: Redirect links to third-party platforms (agencies, airlines, booking platforms).
cgv.section1.p3: Travliaq is not a travel agency and does not directly sell flights, hotels, or activities.
cgv.section2.title: 2. Publisher identification
cgv.section3.title: 3. Services offered
cgv.section3.li1: Free access to certain features (itinerary exploration, suggestions, inspiration).
cgv.section3.li2: Paid services (e.g., detailed itinerary export, premium options, subscriptions).

cgv.section4.title: 4. Pricing and payment
cgv.section4.p1: Prices for Travliaq's paid services are indicated in euros, all taxes included (VAT).
cgv.section4.p2: Payment is made online by credit card via a secure solution.
cgv.section4.p3: Travliaq reserves the right to modify its prices at any time, while ensuring that services will be billed at the price displayed at the time of order.

cgv.section5.p1: Travliaq acts as a technological intermediary: reservations are made with third-party providers.
cgv.section5.p2: Travliaq cannot be held responsible for any modification, cancellation, or service failure by a third-party provider.
cgv.section5.p3: Information (prices, availability, conditions) is provided in real-time via external APIs, subject to errors or updates by partners.
cgv.section6.title: 6. Withdrawal and cancellation
cgv.section6.p1: In accordance with the Consumer Code, the user has a 14-day right of withdrawal for any paid digital service, unless execution has started before the end of this period with their consent.
cgv.section6.p2: Reservations made with third-party partners (flights, hotels, activities) are subject to the conditions of each provider.

cgv.section7.p1: Travliaq collects and processes certain personal data (travel preferences, email, browsing data) in accordance with its Privacy Policy.
cgv.section7.p2: Purpose: provide personalized service, optimize suggestions, and improve the platform.
cgv.section7.p3: The user has the right to access, rectify, and delete their data.
